en.SendMessage.Name: Send Message
en.SendMessage.Description: Sends a single message to the recipient.
en.SetCookie.Name: Set User Cookie
en.SetCookie.Description: Stores a value associated with the current user and dialog.
en.WaitForResponse.Name: Wait for Response
en.WaitForResponse.Description: Pauses the interaction until a response is received from the user.
en.ClearCookie.Name: Clear User Cookie
en.ProcessResponse.Name: Process Response
en.ProcessResponse.Description: Evaluates a response to determine next steps.
en.ProcessCookie.Name: Process Stored Cookie
